sv:property.sv:value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <process xmlns="http://drools.org/drools-5.0/process" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xs:schemaLocation="http://drools.org/drools-5.0/process drools-processes-5.0.xsd" type="RuleFlow" name="PricingCalculator" id="opensoa.drools.pricing" package-name="opensoa.drools" >
<header> <imports> <import name="java.io.InputStreamReader" /> <import name="java.io.Reader" /> <import name="java.util.ArrayList" /> <import name="java.util.Iterator" /> <import name="opensoa.drools.dto.Order" /> <import name="opensoa.drools.dto.Party" /> <import name="opensoa.drools.dto.Product" /> <import name="opensoa.drools.dto.ProductPrice" /> <import name="opensoa.drools.dto.Products" /> <import name="opensoa.drools.dto.Shipping" /> <import name="opensoa.drools.dto.TotalPrice" /> <import name="opensoa.drools.dto.Order" /> <import name="opensoa.drools.dto.Party" /> <import name="opensoa.drools.dto.Product" /> <import name="opensoa.drools.dto.ProductPrice" /> <import name="opensoa.drools.dto.Products" /> <import name="opensoa.drools.dto.Shipping" /> <import name="opensoa.drools.dto.TotalPrice" /> <import name="org.drools.FactHandle" /> <import name="org.drools.QueryResult" /> <import name="org.drools.QueryResults" /> <import name="org.drools.RuleBase" /> <import name="org.drools.RuleBaseFactory" /> <import name="org.drools.StatefulSession" /> <import name="org.drools.WorkingMemory" /> <import name="org.drools.compiler.PackageBuilder" /> <import name="org.drools.rule.Package" /> </imports> </header>
<nodes> <ruleSet id="2" name="Pricing" x="53" y="97" width="80" height="40" ruleFlowGroup="price-calc" /> <ruleSet id="4" name="Shipping" x="177" y="96" width="80" height="40" ruleFlowGroup="shipment-calc" /> <actionNode id="6" name="ConsoleMessage" x="493" y="94" width="80" height="40" > <action type="expression" dialect="java" >System.out.println("That's it -- all done: " + drools.getWorkingMemory().getGlobal("counter"));
QueryResults results; QueryResult result;
/* For some reason, you can't initalize and set a value in the same statement */ results = drools.getWorkingMemory().getQueryResults("FinalPrice");
TotalPrice price; Order ord; Iterator it;
for (it = results.iterator(); it.hasNext();) { result = ( QueryResult ) it.next(); price = (TotalPrice) result.get("total"); ord = (Order) result.get("order"); System.out.println("results: " + price.salePrice); }</action> </actionNode> <start id="1" name="Start" x="52" y="25" width="80" height="40" /> <end id="3" name="End" x="491" y="163" width="80" height="40" /> <ruleSet id="5" name="Special Discounts" x="295" y="94" width="158" height="40" ruleFlowGroup="special-calc" /> </nodes>
<connections> <connection from="1" to="2" /> <connection from="2" to="4" /> <connection from="5" to="6" /> <connection from="6" to="3" /> <connection from="4" to="5" /> </connections>
</process>

ruleflow-group 'price-calc-dsl' salience 20
when
There is an order Retrieve the order line items The customer is a GOLD customer Get the DISCOUNT prices of the products
then Calculate then item's price Update the order Print out the line item's price >price_calc_results_dsl.add ( "Gold-LineItemPrice-DSL" );
DSL for Gold customers line item pricing.
DSL rule for computing Silver customers line items.
DSL rule for computing line item prices for regular customers.
DSL rule for computing quantity-based discounts
DSL for computing the final line item pricing.

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <process xmlns="http://drools.org/drools-5.0/process" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xs:schemaLocation="http://drools.org/drools-5.0/process drools-processes-5.0.xsd" type="RuleFlow" name="PricingCalculator" id="opensoa.drools.pricingDSL" package-name="opensoa.drools" >
<header> <imports> <import name="java.io.InputStreamReader" /> <import name="java.io.Reader" /> <import name="java.util.ArrayList" /> <import name="java.util.Iterator" /> <import name="opensoa.drools.dto.Order" /> <import name="opensoa.drools.dto.Party" /> <import name="opensoa.drools.dto.Product" /> <import name="opensoa.drools.dto.ProductPrice" /> <import name="opensoa.drools.dto.Products" /> <import name="opensoa.drools.dto.Shipping" /> <import name="opensoa.drools.dto.TotalPrice" /> <import name="opensoa.drools.dto.Order" /> <import name="opensoa.drools.dto.Party" /> <import name="opensoa.drools.dto.Product" /> <import name="opensoa.drools.dto.ProductPrice" /> <import name="opensoa.drools.dto.Products" /> <import name="opensoa.drools.dto.Shipping" /> <import name="opensoa.drools.dto.TotalPrice" /> <import name="org.drools.FactHandle" /> <import name="org.drools.QueryResult" /> <import name="org.drools.QueryResults" /> <import name="org.drools.RuleBase" /> <import name="org.drools.RuleBaseFactory" /> <import name="org.drools.StatefulSession" /> <import name="org.drools.WorkingMemory" /> <import name="org.drools.compiler.PackageBuilder" /> <import name="org.drools.rule.Package" /> </imports> </header>
<nodes> <ruleSet id="2" name="Pricing" x="53" y="97" width="80" height="40" ruleFlowGroup="price-calc-dsl" /> <ruleSet id="4" name="Shipping" x="177" y="96" width="80" height="40" ruleFlowGroup="shipment-calc" /> <actionNode id="6" name="ConsoleMessage" x="493" y="94" width="80" height="40" > <action type="expression" dialect="java" >System.out.println("That's it -- all done: " + drools.getWorkingMemory().getGlobal("counter"));
QueryResults results; QueryResult result;
/* For some reason, you can't initalize and set a value in the same statement */ results = drools.getWorkingMemory().getQueryResults("FinalPrice");
TotalPrice price; Order ord; Iterator it;
for (it = results.iterator(); it.hasNext();) { result = ( QueryResult ) it.next(); price = (TotalPrice) result.get("total"); ord = (Order) result.get("order"); System.out.println("results: " + price.salePrice); }</action> </actionNode> <start id="1" name="Start" x="52" y="25" width="80" height="40" /> <end id="3" name="End" x="491" y="163" width="80" height="40" /> <ruleSet id="5" name="Special Discounts" x="295" y="94" width="158" height="40" ruleFlowGroup="special-calc" /> </nodes>
<connections> <connection from="1" to="2" /> <connection from="2" to="4" /> <connection from="5" to="6" /> <connection from="6" to="3" /> <connection from="4" to="5" /> </connections>
</process>
